original_text: But if that person has no close relative to whom restitution can be made for the wrong, the restitution belongs to the Lord and must be given to the priest, along with the ram with which atonement is made for the wrongdoer.
korean_text: 만일 죄 값을 받을 만한 친척이 없으면 그 죄 값을 여호와께 드려 제사장에게로 돌릴 것이니 이는 그를 위하여 속죄할 속죄의 숫양과 함께 돌릴 것이니라

sentences.original_text: But if that person has no close relative
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그 사람에게 가까운 친척이 없으면

sentences.original_text: to whom restitution can be made for the wrong
sentences.korean_translation: 잘못에 대해 보상을 받을 친척이 없으면

sentences.original_text: the restitution belongs to the Lord
and must be given to the priest
